Server Commands

.cfg Detailed character customization. Visibility caste, delayed departure from the party with disconnects, etc.
.autoloot on Enable auto-loot drop.
.autoloot adena Enable auto-loot only Adena.
.en Including English dialogues.
.ru Include Russian dialogues.
.offline Allows you to quit the game, leaving the character to trade or kraft (off-trade \ Craft).
.repair If your character can not enter the game (off with crit, or boot up screen not end)
